title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinventing Pharma Document Workflows to Unlock Value at Scale with Agentic AI
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过智能体AI重塑制药文档工作流程以大规模释放价值
abstract: In pharma, document authoring isn’t just paperwork — it’s central to compliance, growth, and speed to market. From regulatory submissions to CMC and clinical content, authoring consumes vast resources. This session reveals how Agentic AI reimagines pharma document workflows: unlocking unstructured data, enabling intelligent authoring, and integrating compliance checks seamlessly. See how enterprises can cut cycle times, improve quality, and capture new growth by moving from manual writing to agent-led, value-driven authoring at scale. This presentation is brought to you by ZS, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 在制药行业，文档撰写不仅仅是文书工作——它是合规性、增长和上市速度的核心。从监管提交到CMC和临床内容，文档撰写消耗大量资源。本次会议揭示了Agentic AI如何重新构想制药文档工作流程：解锁非结构化数据，实现智能撰写，并无缝集成合规性检查。了解企业如何通过从手动撰写转向代理主导的、价值驱动的规模化撰写，来缩短周期时间、提高质量并获取新的增长机会。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ZS提供。
